.. currentmodule:: tweezepy.smmcalibration

smmcalibration
==============
Standard usage of ``tweezepy`` involves instantiating one of the main user-facing classes, :class:`AV` and :class:`PSD`.

.. autoclass:: AV
    :members:
.. autoclass:: PSD
    :members:
    
The :class:`AV` and :class:`PSD` classes use the base class :class:`calibration`.

.. autoclass:: calibration
    :members:
